security: This document contains personal information (names, social security numbers, salaries) of individuals employed by the Select Committee on Assassinations. Releasing this information could violate privacy and expose personal financial data.
summary: This document is a U.S. House of Representatives certification report listing the employees of the Select Committee on Assassinations, their positions, annual salaries, and gross pay for the accounting period of October 1-31, 1978.
summary_one_paragraph: Dated November 3, 1978, this certification report from the U.S. House of Representatives details the payroll information for the Select Committee on Assassinations for the period of October 1-31, 1978. It lists employees along with their social security numbers, job titles, annual gross salaries, and the amount earned during the specified period. The report also includes a payroll summary showing the total expenditures for investigative staff, with a certification stating that the listed employees performed their duties and have no relationship to a current member of Congress.
title: Certification Report
